29 class KSNavOctreeData
30 {
31  public:
32 
33  KSNavOctreeData():
34  fMaxDepth(0),
35  fSpecifyMaxDepth(0),
36  fSpatialResolution(0),
37  fSpecifyResolution(0),
38  fNAllowedElements(0),
39  fSpecifyAllowedElements(0),
40  fTreeID(""),
41  fNNodes(0)
42  {
43  fFlattenedTree.clear();
44 
45  fIdentitySetNodeIDs.clear();
46  fIdentitySets.clear();
47 
48  fCubeNodeIDs.clear();
49  fCubes.clear();
50  }
51 
52  virtual ~KSNavOctreeData(){};
53 
54  static std::string Name() { return std::string("octree_data");};
55 
56  std::string GetTreeID() const {return fTreeID;};
57  void SetTreeID(const std::string& id){fTreeID = id;};
58 
59  void SetNumberOfTreeNodes(unsigned int n_nodes){fNNodes = n_nodes;};
60  unsigned int GetNumberOfTreeNodes() const {return fNNodes;};
61 
62  void GetFlattenedTree(std::vector<KGNodeData>* node_data) const {*node_data = fFlattenedTree;};
63  void SetFlattenedTree(const std::vector<KGNodeData>* node_data) {fFlattenedTree = *node_data;};
64  const std::vector<KGNodeData>* GetFlattenedTreePointer() const {return &fFlattenedTree;};
65  std::vector<KGNodeData>* GetFlattenedTreePointer() {return &fFlattenedTree;};
66 
67  void GetIdentitySetNodeIDs(std::vector<int>* node_ids) const {*node_ids = fIdentitySetNodeIDs;};
68  void SetIdentitySetNodeIDs(const std::vector<int>* node_ids) {fIdentitySetNodeIDs = *node_ids;};
69  const std::vector<int>* GetIdentitySetNodeIDPointer() const {return &fIdentitySetNodeIDs;};
70  std::vector<int>* GetIdentitySetNodeIDPointer() {return &fIdentitySetNodeIDs;};
71 
72  void GetIdentitySets(std::vector< KGIdentitySet* >* id_sets) const {*id_sets = fIdentitySets;};
73  void SetIdentitySets(const std::vector< KGIdentitySet* >* id_sets) {fIdentitySets = *id_sets;};
74  const std::vector< KGIdentitySet* >* GetIdentitySetPointer() const {return &fIdentitySets;};
75  std::vector< KGIdentitySet* >* GetIdentitySetPointer() {return &fIdentitySets;};
76 
77  void GetCubeNodeIDs(std::vector<int>* node_ids) const {*node_ids = fCubeNodeIDs;};
78  void SetCubeNodeIDs(const std::vector<int>* node_ids) {fCubeNodeIDs = *node_ids;};
79  const std::vector<int>* GetCubeNodeIDPointer() const {return &fCubeNodeIDs;};
80  std::vector<int>* GetCubeNodeIDPointer() {return &fCubeNodeIDs;};
81 
82  void GetCubes(std::vector< KGCube<KGMESH_DIM>* >* cubes) const {*cubes = fCubes;};
83  void SetCubes(const std::vector< KGCube<KGMESH_DIM>* >* cubes) {fCubes = *cubes;};
84  const std::vector< KGCube<KGMESH_DIM>* >* GetCubePointer() const {return &fCubes;};
85  std::vector< KGCube<KGMESH_DIM>* >* GetCubePointer() {return &fCubes;};
86 
87  void SetMaximumOctreeDepth(unsigned int d){fMaxDepth = d;};
88  unsigned int GetMaximumOctreeDepth() const {return fMaxDepth;};
89 
90  void SetSpecifyMaximumOctreeDepth(unsigned int specify)
91  {
92  fSpecifyMaxDepth = 0; if(specify){fSpecifyMaxDepth = 1;};
93  };
94  unsigned int GetSpecifyMaximumOctreeDepth() const {if(fSpecifyMaxDepth == 1){return true;}; return false;};
95 
96  void SetSpatialResolution(double r){fSpatialResolution = r;};
97  double GetSpatialResolution() const { return fSpatialResolution;};
98 
99  void SetSpecifySpatialResolution(unsigned int specify)
100  {
101  fSpecifyResolution = 0; if(specify){fSpecifyResolution = 1;};
102  };
103  unsigned int GetSpecifySpatialResolution() const {if(fSpecifyResolution== 1){return true;}; return false;};
104 
105  void SetNumberOfAllowedElements(unsigned int n){fNAllowedElements = n; fSpecifyAllowedElements = true;};
106  unsigned int GetNumberOfAllowedElements() const {return fNAllowedElements;};
107 
108  void SetSpecifyNumberOfAllowedElements(unsigned int specify)
109  {
110  fSpecifyAllowedElements= 0; if(specify){fSpecifyAllowedElements = 1;};
111  };
112  unsigned int GetSpecifyNumberOfAllowedElements() const {if( fSpecifyAllowedElements == 1){return true;}; return false;};
113 
114  private:
115 
116  //octree construction parameters
117  unsigned int fMaxDepth;
118  unsigned int fSpecifyMaxDepth;
119 
120  double fSpatialResolution;
121  unsigned int fSpecifyResolution;
122 
123  unsigned int fNAllowedElements;
124  unsigned int fSpecifyAllowedElements;
125 
126  //storage for the tree structure (parent to child links)
127  std::string fTreeID;
128  unsigned int fNNodes;
129  std::vector<KGNodeData> fFlattenedTree;
130 
131  //list of mesh elements mappedd to each node
132  std::vector< int > fIdentitySetNodeIDs;
133  std::vector< KGIdentitySet* > fIdentitySets;
134 
135  //list of cubes mapped to each node
136  std::vector< int > fCubeNodeIDs;
137  std::vector< KGCube<KGMESH_DIM>* > fCubes;
138 };

143 template <typename Stream>
144 Stream& operator>>(Stream& s, KSNavOctreeData& aData)
145 {
146  s.PreStreamInAction(aData);
147  //
148  unsigned int max_depth;
149  s >> max_depth;
150  aData.SetMaximumOctreeDepth(max_depth);
151 
152  unsigned int specify_max_depth;
153  s >> specify_max_depth;
154  aData.SetSpecifyMaximumOctreeDepth(specify_max_depth);
155 
156  double spatial_res;
157  s >> spatial_res;
158  aData.SetSpatialResolution(spatial_res);
159 
160  unsigned int specify_res;
161  s >> specify_res;
162  aData.SetSpecifySpatialResolution(specify_res);
163 
164  unsigned int n_allowed;
165  s >> n_allowed;
166  aData.SetNumberOfAllowedElements(n_allowed);
167 
168  unsigned int specify_allowed;
169  s >> specify_allowed;
170  aData.SetSpecifyNumberOfAllowedElements(specify_allowed);
171 
172  unsigned int n_nodes;
173  s >> n_nodes;
174  aData.SetNumberOfTreeNodes(n_nodes);
175 
176  std::vector<KGNodeData>* flattened_tree = aData.GetFlattenedTreePointer();
177  unsigned int n_flattened_nodes;
178  s >> n_flattened_nodes;
179  flattened_tree->resize(0);
180  flattened_tree->reserve(n_flattened_nodes);
181  for(unsigned int i=0; i < n_flattened_nodes; i++)
182  {
183  KGNodeData node_data;
184  s >> node_data;
185  flattened_tree->push_back(node_data);
186  }
187 
188 
189  std::vector<int>* id_set_node_ids = aData.GetIdentitySetNodeIDPointer();
190  unsigned int id_set_node_ids_size;
191  s >> id_set_node_ids_size;
192  id_set_node_ids->resize(0);
193  id_set_node_ids->reserve(id_set_node_ids_size);
194  for(unsigned int i=0; i < id_set_node_ids_size; i++)
195  {
196  unsigned int id;
197  s >> id;
198  id_set_node_ids->push_back(id);
199  }
200 
201  std::vector< KGIdentitySet* >* id_set = aData.GetIdentitySetPointer();
202  unsigned int id_set_size;
203  s >> id_set_size;
204  id_set->resize(0);
205  id_set->reserve(id_set_size);
206  for(unsigned int i=0; i < id_set_size; i++)
207  {
208  KGIdentitySet* set = new KGIdentitySet();
209  s >> *set;
210  id_set->push_back(set);
211  }
212 
213  std::vector<int>* cube_node_ids = aData.GetCubeNodeIDPointer();
214  unsigned int cube_node_ids_size;
215  s >> cube_node_ids_size;
216  cube_node_ids->resize(0);
217  cube_node_ids->reserve(cube_node_ids_size);
218  for(unsigned int i=0; i < cube_node_ids_size; i++)
219  {
220  unsigned int id;
221  s >> id;
222  cube_node_ids->push_back(id);
223  }
224 
225  std::vector< KGCube<KGMESH_DIM>* >* cubes = aData.GetCubePointer();
226  unsigned int cube_size;
227  s >> cube_size;
228  cubes->resize(0);
229  cubes->reserve(cube_size);
230  for(unsigned int i=0; i < cube_size; i++)
231  {
232  KGCube<KGMESH_DIM>* cube = new KGCube<KGMESH_DIM>();
233  s >> *cube;
234  cubes->push_back(cube);
235  }
236 
237  s.PostStreamInAction(aData);
238  return s;
239 }
240 
241 template <typename Stream>
242 Stream& operator<<(Stream& s,const KSNavOctreeData& aData)
243 {
244  s.PreStreamOutAction(aData);
245 
246  s << aData.GetMaximumOctreeDepth();
247  s << aData.GetSpecifyMaximumOctreeDepth();
248  s << aData.GetSpatialResolution();
249  s << aData.GetSpecifySpatialResolution();
250  s << aData.GetNumberOfAllowedElements();
251  s << aData.GetSpecifyNumberOfAllowedElements();
252  s << aData.GetNumberOfTreeNodes();
253 
254  const std::vector<KGNodeData>* flattened_tree = aData.GetFlattenedTreePointer();
255  unsigned int n_flattened_nodes = flattened_tree->size();
256  s << n_flattened_nodes;
257  for(unsigned int i=0; i< n_flattened_nodes; i++)
258  {
259  s << (*flattened_tree)[i];
260  }
261 
262  const std::vector<int>* id_set_node_ids = aData.GetIdentitySetNodeIDPointer();
263  unsigned int id_set_node_ids_size = id_set_node_ids->size();
264  s << id_set_node_ids_size;
265  for(unsigned int i=0; i < id_set_node_ids_size; i++)
266  {
267  s << (*id_set_node_ids)[i];
268  }
269 
270  const std::vector< KGIdentitySet* >* id_set = aData.GetIdentitySetPointer();
271  unsigned int id_set_size = id_set->size();
272  s << id_set_size;
273  for(unsigned int i=0; i < id_set_size; i++)
274  {
275  s << *( (*id_set)[i] );
276  }
277 
278  const std::vector<int>* cube_node_ids = aData.GetCubeNodeIDPointer();
279  unsigned int cube_node_ids_size = cube_node_ids->size();
280  s << cube_node_ids_size;
281  for(unsigned int i=0; i < cube_node_ids_size; i++)
282  {
283  s << (*cube_node_ids)[i];
284  }
285 
286  const std::vector< KGCube<KGMESH_DIM>* >* cubes = aData.GetCubePointer();
287  unsigned int cube_size = cubes->size();
288  s << cube_size;
289  for(unsigned int i=0; i < cube_size; i++)
290  {
291  s << *( (*cubes)[i] );
292  }
293 
294  s.PostStreamOutAction(aData);
295 
296  return s;
297 }

300 }
